wikipedia_page.main: Colin George Meldrum (born 26 November 1975) in Kilmarnock is a Scottish former professional Goalkeeper and coach, who previously played for Kilmarnock, Livingston, Forfar Athletic and Motherwell. Whilst at the East Ayrshire club, Meldrum had loan spells at Stranraer and Ross County.
